jp.pay.android

クラス PayjpCardForm

  • jp.pay.android.PayjpCardForm

  • public class PayjpCardForm

    Card form client.

    • フィールドの詳細

      • FACE_MULTI_LINE

        public static int FACE_MULTI_LINE
        関連項目:
        定数フィールド値

      • FACE_CARD_DISPLAY

        public static int FACE_CARD_DISPLAY
        関連項目:
        定数フィールド値

      • INSTANCE

        public static PayjpCardForm INSTANCE

        Card form client.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • configure

        public void configure(PayjpLogger logger,
                      PayjpTokenService tokenService,
                      CardScannerPlugin cardScannerPlugin,
                      PayjpTokenBackgroundHandler handler,
                      java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor)

      • start

        public void start(android.app.Activity activity,
                  java.lang.Integer requestCode,
                  TenantId tenant,
                  int face)

        Start card form screen from Activity.

        パラメータ:
        activity - activity
        requestCode - requestCode. The default is PayjpCardFormActivity.DEFAULT_CARD_FORM_REQUEST_CODE
        tenant - tenant (only for platformer)
        face - card form face. The default is FACE_MULTI_LINE.

      • start

        public void start(NonExistentClass fragment,
                  java.lang.Integer requestCode,
                  TenantId tenant,
                  int face)

        Start card form screen from Fragment.

        パラメータ:
        fragment - fragment
        requestCode - requestCode. The default is PayjpCardFormActivity.DEFAULT_CARD_FORM_REQUEST_CODE
        tenant - tenant (only for platformer)

      • handleResult

        public void handleResult(android.content.Intent data,
                         PayjpCardFormResultCallback callback)

        Handle the result from the activity which is started by PayjpCardForm.start. Use this at Activity.onActivityResult in the activity that you call PayjpCardForm.start.

        パラメータ:
        data - the intent from Activity.onActivityResult.
        callback - you can get card token if it is success.
        関連項目:
        PayjpCardForm.start, Activity.onActivityResult, PayjpCardForm.start

      • newFragment

        public PayjpCardFormFragment newFragment(boolean holderNameEnabled,
                                         TenantId tenantId,
                                         CardBrand[] acceptedBrands)
        非推奨です。 

        Create new fragment instance with args

        パラメータ:
        holderNameEnabled - a option it require card holder name or not.
        tenantId - a option for platform tenant.
        acceptedBrands - accepted brands. if it is null, the fragment try to get them.
        戻り値:
        fragment

      • newCardFormFragment

        public PayjpCardFormAbstractFragment newCardFormFragment(boolean holderNameEnabled,
                                                         TenantId tenantId,
                                                         CardBrand[] acceptedBrands,
                                                         int face)

        Create new Fragment instance that inherited class PayjpCardFormAbstractFragment.

        パラメータ:
        holderNameEnabled - a option it require card holder name or not.
        tenantId - a option for platform tenant.
        acceptedBrands - accepted brands. if it is null, the fragment try to get them.
        face - form appearance type. cf. annotationclass PayjpCardForm.CardFormFace
        関連項目:
        class PayjpCardFormAbstractFragment
